replies.body: Yay, a cool skin for a champ you probably do not know or even play for that matter but know you're gonna try to main her and fail, than get cyber bullied for how bad you are then make another post about cyberbullying then someone tells you to suck it up and you do and hey, now your not maining that champ anymore. So tired of this, a friend of mine got the same thing and now after a few days of playing Riven on and off and he barely has a 40% winrate on her and doesn't even have an even KDA overall over 10+ games

> [{quoted}](name=Wast3land ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FkVkEhNu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-24T16:20:23.311+0000)
>
> Yay, a cool skin for a champ you probably do not know or even play for that matter but know you're gonna try to main her and fail, than get cyber bullied for how bad you are then make another post about cyberbullying then someone tells you to suck it up and you do and hey, now your not maining that champ anymore. So tired of this, a friend of mine got the same thing and now after a few days of playing Riven on and off and he barely has a 40% winrate on her and doesn't even have an even KDA overall over 10+ games

xd
What a wonderful thing to say to someone who is only gracious about a free gift they got from Rito. 
so what, are people just supposed to not use free shit they are given now? or are they somehow undeserving of it? You should be happy for the good fortune of others. yes this skin would probably do an actual Riven main alot of good, but that is irrelevant. In this case, the gift is doing OP some good.
I'm gonna say the same thing my mum said to the doctor when i was born " Is there a return policy? "
Wait was dat the birthday gift?
Probably, if you already have riot kayle then they would give you a mystery skin instead.

Are you being sarcastic? Or are you happy?
{{champion:32}} Or {{champion:119}}
